DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the performance of the PureVision Lens designs when worn on a 30-day continuous wear basis
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Performance of PureVision Lens Designs
DOC.criteria: subject is myopic VA correctable to 0.3 logMAR or better (driving vision) Clear central cornea Systemic disease affecting ocular health using systemic or topical medications wear monovision, multifocal or toric contact lenses Any grade 2 or greater slit lamp findings
